responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "FA5DD75A43010A817A6D26B06291AFC0", "What? That\'s just a rumor set about in a child\'s fable. Yet, if it true, such an artifact would fetch and empire in trade. I know more about this gem than you think. If we have any chance of getting it, we\'re going to have to raise the Demons of Duzahk to have any chance of getting it. We\'ll need the Seals of Sephillion.")
name: MADD_0007_WOO_NPC_ThePiper_25
